text:
Hi all. I am a HubSpot freelancer with 6+ years of experience in the platform (not a dev however). As well as offering my freelance services, I am currently building a start-up and would love the opportunity to speak to current customers of HubSpot for research, to help me build a better product. In particular if you’ve recently onboarded to the platform with a freelancer/partner agency, or recently hired a freelancer/partner agency to help implement a project that involves working with HubSpot.

To stress, this is not a sales call at all. I would only like the opportunity to ask you a few questions about the pain points (if any) you face to make sure the product adds the most value.

Please connect with me on on LinkedIn, or message me on here: <https://www.linkedin.com/in/matthewaire/>
Hi <@U06KNHTA3LG> - sent you a LinkedIn request.
